001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;

003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.MinsTime;

017/**
018 * Returns reminders configured on the pump.
019 */
020/**
021 * Returns reminders configured on the pump.
022 *
023
024 *
025 * <br>
026 *
027 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.RemindersRequest}, opCode 89, size 105
028 *
029 * <br>
030 *
031 * 
032 * <table border='1'>
033 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>89</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>105</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.RemindersRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * </table>
039 */@MessageProps(
040    opCode=89,
041    size=105,
042    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
043    request=RemindersRequest.class
044)
045public class RemindersResponse extends StatusMessage {
046    
047    private Reminder lowBGReminder;
048    private Reminder highBGReminder;
049    private Reminder siteChangeReminder;
050    private Reminder missedBolusReminder0;
051    private Reminder missedBolusReminder1;
052    private Reminder missedBolusReminder2;
053    private Reminder missedBolusReminder3;
054    private Reminder afterBolusReminder;
055    private Reminder additionalBolusReminder;
056    private int lowBGThreshold;
057    private int highBGThreshold;
058    private int siteChangeDays;
059    private int status;
060    
061    public RemindersResponse() {}
062    
063    public RemindersResponse(Reminder lowBGReminder, Reminder highBGReminder, Reminder siteChangeReminder, Reminder missedBolusReminder0, Reminder missedBolusReminder1, Reminder missedBolusReminder2, Reminder missedBolusReminder3, Reminder afterBolusReminder, Reminder additionalBolusReminder, int lowBGThreshold, int highBGThreshold, int siteChangeDays, int status) {
064        this.cargo = buildCargo(lowBGReminder, highBGReminder, siteChangeReminder, missedBolusReminder0, missedBolusReminder1, missedBolusReminder2, missedBolusReminder3, afterBolusReminder, additionalBolusReminder, lowBGThreshold, highBGThreshold, siteChangeDays, status);
065        this.lowBGReminder = lowBGReminder;
066        this.highBGReminder = highBGReminder;
067        this.siteChangeReminder = siteChangeReminder;
068        this.missedBolusReminder0 = missedBolusReminder0;
069        this.missedBolusReminder1 = missedBolusReminder1;
070        this.missedBolusReminder2 = missedBolusReminder2;
071        this.missedBolusReminder3 = missedBolusReminder3;
072        this.afterBolusReminder = afterBolusReminder;
073        this.additionalBolusReminder = additionalBolusReminder;
074        this.lowBGThreshold = lowBGThreshold;
075        this.highBGThreshold = highBGThreshold;
076        this.siteChangeDays = siteChangeDays;
077        this.status = status;
078        
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * <table border="1">
083     * <caption>Parsed fields for RemindersResponse:</caption>
084     * <tr><td><code>lowBGReminder</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td><code>highBGReminder</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 11)</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td><code>siteChangeReminder</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 22)</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td><code>missedBolusReminder0</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 33)</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td><code>missedBolusReminder1</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 44)</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td><code>missedBolusReminder2</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 55)</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td><code>missedBolusReminder3</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 66)</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td><code>afterBolusReminder</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 77)</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td><code>additionalBolusReminder</code></td><td><code>new Reminder(raw, 88)</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td><code>lowBGThreshold</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 99)</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td><code>highBGThreshold</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 101)</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td><code>siteChangeDays</code></td><td><code>raw[103]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td><code>status</code></td><td><code>raw[104]</code></td></tr>
097     * </table>
098     */
099    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
100        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
101        this.cargo = raw;
102        this.lowBGReminder = new Reminder(raw, 0);
103        this.highBGReminder = new Reminder(raw, 11);
104        this.siteChangeReminder = new Reminder(raw, 22);
105        this.missedBolusReminder0 = new Reminder(raw, 33);
106        this.missedBolusReminder1 = new Reminder(raw, 44);
107        this.missedBolusReminder2 = new Reminder(raw, 55);
108        this.missedBolusReminder3 = new Reminder(raw, 66);
109        this.afterBolusReminder = new Reminder(raw, 77);
110        this.additionalBolusReminder = new Reminder(raw, 88);
111        this.lowBGThreshold = Bytes.readShort(raw, 99);
112        this.highBGThreshold = Bytes.readShort(raw, 101);
113        this.siteChangeDays = raw[103];
114        this.status = raw[104];
115        
116    }
117
118    
119    /**
120     * <table border="1">
121     * <caption>Byte layout for RemindersResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
122     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
123     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(lowBGThreshold) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
124     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(lowBGThreshold) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
125     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(highBGThreshold) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
126     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(highBGThreshold) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
127     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>(byte) siteChangeDays</code></td></tr>
128     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>(byte) status</code></td></tr>
129     * </table>
130     */
131    public static byte[] buildCargo(Reminder lowBGReminder, Reminder highBGReminder, Reminder siteChangeReminder, Reminder missedBolusReminder0, Reminder missedBolusReminder1, Reminder missedBolusReminder2, Reminder missedBolusReminder3, Reminder afterBolusReminder, Reminder additionalBolusReminder, int lowBGThreshold, int highBGThreshold, int siteChangeDays, int status)  {
132        return Bytes.combine(
133            lowBGReminder.buildCargo(),
134            highBGReminder.buildCargo(),
135            siteChangeReminder.buildCargo(),
136            missedBolusReminder0.buildCargo(),
137            missedBolusReminder1.buildCargo(),
138            missedBolusReminder2.buildCargo(),
139            missedBolusReminder3.buildCargo(),
140            afterBolusReminder.buildCargo(),
141            additionalBolusReminder.buildCargo(),
142            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(lowBGThreshold), 
143            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(highBGThreshold), 
144            new byte[]{ (byte) siteChangeDays }, 
145            new byte[]{ (byte) status });
146    }
147    
148    public Reminder getLowBGReminder() {
149        return lowBGReminder;
150    }
151    public Reminder getHighBGReminder() {
152        return highBGReminder;
153    }
154    public Reminder getSiteChangeReminder() {
155        return siteChangeReminder;
156    }
157    public Reminder getMissedBolusReminder0() {
158        return missedBolusReminder0;
159    }
160    public Reminder getMissedBolusReminder1() {
161        return missedBolusReminder1;
162    }
163    public Reminder getMissedBolusReminder2() {
164        return missedBolusReminder2;
165    }
166    public Reminder getMissedBolusReminder3() {
167        return missedBolusReminder3;
168    }
169    public Reminder getAfterBolusReminder() {
170        return afterBolusReminder;
171    }
172    public Reminder getAdditionalBolusReminder() {
173        return additionalBolusReminder;
174    }
175    public int getLowBGThreshold() {
176        return lowBGThreshold;
177    }
178    public int getHighBGThreshold() {
179        return highBGThreshold;
180    }
181    public int getSiteChangeDays() {
182        return siteChangeDays;
183    }
184    /**
185     * @return 0 if successful
186     */
187    public int getStatus() {
188        return status;
189    }
190
191    public static class Reminder {
192        private final long frequency;
193        private final int startTime;
194        private final int endTime;
195        private final int activeDays;
196        private final int enabled;
197        private final int validityStatus;
198
199        public Reminder(long frequency, int startTime, int endTime, int activeDays, int enabled, int validityStatus) {
200            this.frequency = frequency;
201            this.startTime = startTime;
202            this.endTime = endTime;
203            this.activeDays = activeDays;
204            this.enabled = enabled;
205            this.validityStatus = validityStatus; // TODO: figure out what this represents
206        }
207
208        public Reminder(byte[] cargo, int i) {
209            this.frequency = Bytes.readUint32(cargo, i);
210            this.startTime = Bytes.readShort(cargo, i+4);
211            this.endTime = Bytes.readShort(cargo, i+6);
212            this.activeDays = cargo[i+8];
213            this.enabled = cargo[i+9];
214            this.validityStatus = cargo[i+10];
215        }
216
217        public byte[] buildCargo() {
218            return Bytes.combine(
219                Bytes.toUint32(frequency),
220                    Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(startTime),
221                    Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(endTime),
222                    new byte[]{ (byte) activeDays},
223                    new byte[]{ (byte) enabled},
224                    new byte[]{ (byte) validityStatus});
225        }
226
227        public long getFrequencyMins() {
228            return frequency;
229        }
230
231        public MinsTime getFrequency() {
232            return new MinsTime((int) frequency);
233        }
234
235        public int getStartTimeMins() {
236            return startTime;
237        }
238
239        public MinsTime getStartTime() {
240            return new MinsTime(startTime);
241        }
242
243        public int getEndTimeMins() {
244            return endTime;
245        }
246
247        public MinsTime getEndTime() {
248            return new MinsTime(endTime);
249        }
250
251        public int getActiveDaysBitmask() {
252            return activeDays;
253        }
254
255        public Set<MultiDay> getActiveDays() {
256            return MultiDay.fromBitmask(activeDays);
257        }
258
259        public int getEnabled() {
260            return enabled;
261        }
262
263        public int getValidityStatus() {
264            return validityStatus;
265        }
266
267        public String toString() {
268            return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, new HashSet<String>());
269        }
270    }
271    
272}
